portfolios.name: OhFarm
portfolios.author: peigeng jiang
portfolios.title: OhFarm Application Project
portfolios.sub-title: An application that provides thorough information about kitchen farming
portfolios.body: This application is designed to provide information about kitchen farming. The application contains hundreds of plants that are suitable for growing inside household. Additionally, it provides tracking system to alart user when to water and harvest. For those people whom has limited space inside their household, this application also provide map with community garden around users.

portfolios.name: DUÜET Website
portfolios.author: peigeng jiang
portfolios.title: DUÜET Website Redesign
portfolios.sub-title: DUÜET website reflect on current design trend and align with it's company startegy
portfolios.body: DUÜET is a Melbourne based wedding photography and videography studio. This project redesigned company's website to align with current design trend and company's vision. By researching target audiences of the company and it's business strategy, we quickly settled design style, color secheme and layout. The new design result in 50% increase in vist rate the following month after publishing.

portfolios.name: FanFou Website
portfolios.author: peigeng jiang
portfolios.title: FanFou Website Design
portfolios.sub-title: Web design for Sichuan food restaurant
portfolios.body: Web design for Sichuan food restaurant. Using red color and pattern as the base of the design to represent hot and spicy flavor in Sichuan food. Bright color and traditional Chinese pattern have also been used as iconic Chinese design elements.

portfolios.title: DesTech project
portfolios.sub-title: An Event Rebranding project with DesTech, International Conference on design & technology
portfolios.body: An Event Rebranding project with DesTech, International Conference on design & technology. This 6 month project established by four member team and assisted by DesTech designer.
